name: The Sinister Fairground: Horror Adventure Gamebook
storyline:
Your girlfriend has gone missing at a weird fairground just outside of town, and only you can save her. As you explore the attractions, you quickly realize this is no ordinary carnival.
Populated by crazy carnies and dozens of other enigmatic, fearsome and downright weird characters, your choose your own route through the creepy carnival and its spine-chilling attractions.
Solve bizarre puzzles, engage in combat, test your luck, dodge a labyrinthe full of dangers and try to escape with your body -- and maybe even your mind -- still intact!
Brought to you by Cubus Games; a collective of renowned choose-your-own-adventure story and RPG writers, artists and musicians. The Sinister Fairground is a new evolution in the world of digital gamebooks that offers huge replay value and an immersive, exciting literary experience.
summary:
This is a horrifying adventure through a fairground of weird characters, dangers, challenges and quizzes.
The Sinister Fairground is a mind-altering world where nightmares and reality change places at every turn, and nothing is as it seems. An evolution of classic choose-your-own-adventure game-books, this darkly enchanting story puts you in control, and takes you on a journey through twisted fairground attractions that you'll never forget!
